website_summaries.verdict: This toy is a nice option for kids who love dolls and Barbie, although immersing it in water may reduce the longevity of its functions.
pros: Barbie with a twist, as this pretty doll lights up and has mermaid fins that make swimming movements
Outfit has bold colors and shimmery effects that kids love
cons: Although kids will want to play with it in the water, the moisture may cause the batteries to malfunction, making the lights fail to work

customer_reviews.title: Use with Caution!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 7-year-old on her birthday. Would not turn off after the first time being used. It had a very strange smell the next day. Took the back off and the batteries were brown and slimy. Called Mattel and they said to send them the doll for review and they will send me my money back. Broke my daughter's heart.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Woods

customer_reviews.title: Get the first version, not this one
customer_reviews.text: I have the first version of this for all three of my girls and it’s worked fine for more than a year. Bought this newer version and the mechanism to make the doll light up is different. It often stuck causing the light to stay on. After only a couple weeks, the battery is dead. It’s also a lessor quality than the first version. The paint is already chipping and it’s generally just “cheap.”
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Died after a few days of use
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her birthday and was terribly disappointed that it broke after only a few times of using it in the tub. The lights stayed on permanently, so I took the batteries out and notices water had gotten into the compartment. After drying it out the doll doesn't light up at all. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rashella

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it gets wet, defeats the entire purpose of a water toy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to use in the bathtub. Used it one time and now the lights in the tail will not stop flashing. How do you make a kids toy that is designed to be used in water and not make the electronics waterproof is just stupid. Opened the battery compartment and sure enough full of water and the batteries are already rusted. There is literally nothing protecting the insides from getting wet, there is no seal for the battery compartment.
customer_reviews.author: MyNameIsJay

customer_reviews.title: Barbie no longer lights up
customer_reviews.text: After about a week after receiving this Barbie's tail no longer lights up. I ordered new LR44 batteries because the instructions said something to the affect of the batteries which comes with it are for trial use. Now I am out $26.84... which is the cost of the Barbie ($20.75 inc tax) as well as a pack of LR44 batteries ($6.09 inc tax). My 4 year old is quite upset, especially since I said don't worry.. I have new batteries ordered and that will be sure to fix it. Though come to find out today they did not bring new life into 'her'...
customer_reviews.author: Bill Rahe

customer_reviews.title: Broke first day used!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally on first day she played with it in her bathtub and we did not leave submerged...but the lights wouldnt shut off in her tail.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Allison

customer_reviews.title: Hair hair everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as a birthday gift. She loves it. One huge problem is the Barbie's hair is falling out everywhere. Every time I turn stopping around, there's more Barbie hair. I thought it was something my daughter was doing but no you just run your hands through it and out it comes.

customer_reviews.title: Fun bath time toy!
customer_reviews.text: Barbie is so so cute, she is really beautiful and I love how her tail lights up. My daughter will love this gift for the bathtub. The only reason I could t give it a full 5 stars is there was a slice going down the package like some had tried to cut into it. However, it is clear that Barbie hadn’t been tampered with. Still great gift and price. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Recommended buy!! I bought 2 barbies for upcoming birthday gifts and they are adorable. The lights in her tail are super bright too instead of that dull just barely visible light thats usually in toys, so that makes it even more appealing. Great price for a great toy. Will definitely buy for future gifts
customer_reviews.author: Alesha

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Barbie as a Christmas gift to my 4 year old. She absolutely loves it ! She loves to take it to the bath with her . The barbie’s tail lights up when you press the sides and her tail moves when you keep pressing it so it looks like she’s swimming underwater . Definitely a must buy if your kid is a Barbie fan. Makes bath time easier too!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only a day
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful doll, but the tail stopped lighting up after only a day of use. My daughter was very disappointed, to say the least. After reading reviews of others having this same issue, I would say the design is faulty. I would return it except my daughter otherwise likes the doll and I feel, because there is a flaw in the design, a replacement would likely similarly fail. I wouldn’t recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hulsey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter begged for one of these for Christmas. She's only played with it twice and the doll will not cut off. And her paint is already chipping! The $4 barbies from walmart in the painted on swimsuits are better quality than this! And they've been in a chlorinated pool all summer! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: We just received today very excited about it, fast shipping thank you Amazon. One thing is that noise it does make when we push the side bottoms for swimming motion, I am not very happy about it. Is going to be so hard to return it due to my daughter is very excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: yayi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Realistic Barbie Mermaid
customer_reviews.text: As lifelike a mermaid that any 2 & 1/2 year old could have. Favorite toy to share, always a next in line to share when two year olds get together. She lights and flips her fins with such finesse that she is the star of any water play activities.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Derx

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money ..
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this Barbie. My daughter was so excited to play with it. The lights stopped working after few days. Even though it says you can put in water, after few minutes, the paint was going away as you can see from the photo. It is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves It
customer_reviews.text: This Barbie is a bath-time hit with my daughter and her brother even likes borrowing it. Barbie's tail has fun lights and moves when they press her sides. Holding up well even after lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! Works well. The tail feels realistic not like hard plastic. I wouldn't recommend it for water though.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be my daughter’s favorite birthday gift. She asks for her mermaid every night at bath time and loves singing and talking to her in the bath. She hasn’t lost interest in weeks and that probably the best compliment a toddler can give a toy!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This Barbie made a great gift for my granddaughter. It is well made and does work in the bath. Barbie moves around in the water, swishing her tail while the lights glow through the water.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Luberto-Geisel

customer_reviews.title: Battery leaks when submerged in water
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter as a Christmas present this past year. She brought it in the tub with her and the lights have not stopped flashing. I opened up the battery pack and the battery was leaking. So disappointed with this since it was made for water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids like it - but....
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter was very excited to get this. Not sure if I got a bad one or not, but after every use I have to take the batteries out because the lights won't stop flashing. There are 2 small screws holding in the batteries so it's kind of a pain. But she does love playing with it in the tub.
customer_reviews.author: sfoley

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a beautiful doll.
customer_reviews.text: This doll is absolutely beautiful. The sparkles are bright & the colors of her outfit just dazzling. My granddaughter just loves it. Great price & exceptionally quality. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Connie Heisler

customer_reviews.title: MERMAID MADE A BIG SPLASH
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my sister's granddaughter and she loved it. Toy just as described and the mermaid lights up. Waterproof so she was able to play with it while bathing. Beautiful well constructed mermaid doll and one little girl was all smiles when she received it.
customer_reviews.author: Derbert D. Mooney Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested, Dad approved
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says "I like how it lights up and the tail moves! I also like how her head moves and she has a crown that makes her a magical mermaid." In a fan, and so is she!
customer_reviews.author: Barbeau

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but limited usage
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but limited while playing in water. Commercial showing that you can place it under water but manual saying that it is designed not for submerge...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Tunik

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: Was great until it broke! After a few uses, the light came on on its own and wouldn’t shut off. Stayed on for days until it finally died. Now it won’t light up at all.
customer_reviews.author: NDL

customer_reviews.title: Grand Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very colorful. Tail moves with waist buttons. Lights up when button is pressed or when placed in water.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Great mermaids and gorgeous lights and tails
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughters were thrilled with these mermaid Barbies! So pretty and The lights are gorgeous. They just wished the dolls could swim alone without pressing the buttons!
customer_reviews.author: JAM Fam.

customer_reviews.title: So colorful
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old granddaughter loved the lighted features of this Barbie both in and out of the bathtub. It is very colorful with the lighted effects.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Super cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My youngest is into mermaids and this one is perfect! She lights up and her fin moves which makes her realistic! she a perfect addition to the bathtub!
customer_reviews.author: blfrana

customer_reviews.title: THAT'S NOT WHAT I EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: IT IS NOT WHAT I EXPECTED, IT IS PRETTY SIMPLE, THE SKIRT OF THE MERMAID'S TAIL, ARRIVED DETERIORATED DURING SHIPPING ON THE EYEBROW THAT IS OPEN FROM THE BOX
customer_reviews.author: yskarel

customer_reviews.title: Mermaid Barbie
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited to receive this for Christmas. The interactive lights and swimming motion of the tail was a big hit. I was impressed with the quality of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter was disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Description eludes that her tail swims once it’s in the water. Not true, must push/hold a button. Granddaughter was disappointed then barely played with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken After Less Than 1 Week
customer_reviews.text: Big disappointment! This is meant to go in the water, but after only two times, it is now malfunctioning. The lights will not go off. We have had the toy for less than 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Barbie
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and pretty lights. 1st purchase and Barbie wouldn’t stop lighting up. Contacted matel and had another in mail in just few days.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Walker

customer_reviews.title: Light won’t turn off stays on
customer_reviews.text: Favorite toy until now..... light has been on 15 hours took batteries out put back in still on won’t turn off like it did before. Very sad started return process 😔.
customer_reviews.author: KIKOAMAZON317

customer_reviews.title: Great Barbie
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loves to take this Barbie in the bathtub and it works perfectly. We’ve had several baths with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: C. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Lights stopped after a week or so
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old LOVED this for Xmas BUT not even two weeks later the Barbie stopped lighting up. Pretty disappointed, I need to check the reviews to see if anyone else had similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: Fae Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Barbie mermaid
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but the grandkids played with it for 10 minutes then put aside and still in toy box after weeks. Kind of bored them .
customer_reviews.author: sha

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: JUNK! The lights wouldn’t turn off after the first use and eventually died. I ordered a replacement and same thing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lights
customer_reviews.text: A gift any young girl would love to have. For her bath or the pool...or even your sink if you’re brave enough. She Lights up really pretty, but her packaging says the lights respond to water as well. Which did not happen. Maybe it needed to be warmer? Still a fun Barbie to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fun Barbie Toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy was a gift for my daughter. She plays with it in the bathtub and after 2 months the lights are still working for us. I was a little worried after reading some of the other reviews where it had stopped working after a few days but I haven’t had any issues. Fun toy!
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has really enjoyed this Barbie. She has enjoyed it in the bathtub, outside playing, and in her Barbie house. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: KaraD

customer_reviews.title: Cute but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The actual Barbie is pretty cute and the lights are bright. My daughter will enjoy playing with this. However, it arrived ripped open already with what looks like leftover wrapping paper on it. This is a birthday gift for my daughter! A little pissed.
customer_reviews.author: MadeByJeff

customer_reviews.title: My fault
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it but I didn't read the description carefully and thought the dolls tail moved on it's own in water did not realize you had to push a button to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Ries

customer_reviews.title: Cool mermaid doll
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little neice. She loves the doll. She loves to bring it in the bath with her.
customer_reviews.author: K.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the lights did not last long so a lil disappointed but she loved it while they did.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loved this. She received it for her birthday. She bathes with this and it has been fine for over 3 months, I always just air dry it right after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. She instantly fell in love with it. Good quality and looks cute. Works well in water too...
customer_reviews.author: Lokendar

customer_reviews.title: NA
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is a HUGE Barbie fan so this Barbie was another one she wanted/needed to add to her toys.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I think being an 80's baby I was more impressed with this than my 4 year old niece was but I still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Emily See

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really wanted this doll, so I've ordered it for New year's present, and it still works. After every tube we put it into the towel. Face of marmaid cery nice, nice colours.
customer_reviews.author: Ket

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has the best prices and I don’t have to go anywhere!!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old wanted mermaids for Christmas so I ordered this one! Didn’t disappoint! She loves it and I got it for a great price on amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Danielle Gwin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old loves it! Great gift idea for play outside tub, in the tub or at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Child requested
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old girl requested for a birthday party. I got it and she loves it! Squeeze the waist for her to talk. Cute and fun, but a little pricey for my taste!

customer_reviews.title: Works in the water.
customer_reviews.text: Lights and color changing tail is so cute and my 5 & 3 year old granddaughters really enjoy them in the bathtub and the pool.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for 6-year old!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 6-year old. She LOVED it! Took it to Reno Casino pool. Held up under water for hours. Lights up, tail moves. It doesn’t float. Outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.author: Luluzback

customer_reviews.title: Fun Barbie
customer_reviews.text: What 5 year-old doesn't like barbies or mermaids! Best of both worlds and that she is a tub toy is added bonus.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Barbie toy and value is exactly what to expect
customer_reviews.text: It was absolutely cute online but stopped working after a few hours of use .
customer_reviews.author: iluvbreyers

customer_reviews.title: Good doll
customer_reviews.text: If you have a little girl this is a must have! Pros are the colors are bright and a good quality doll! The tail would light up a bit brighter but overall good!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Present for my granddaughter and she absolutely loved it. Lights worked, tail moved Great value
customer_reviews.author: Flaggirl0701

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use them in water!
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and my granddaughters loved them. However, like many of the other reviews I read, the lights wouldn’t turn off after just a couple of times in the bathtub. When the battery compartment was opened, water had gotten in. I am surprised these are advertised for use in water since they don’t last when used that way.
customer_reviews.author: Janet, LA

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great Barbie mermaid. Does not soak in a lot of water even when submitted. Lights work great

customer_reviews.title: It is a dangerous toy not meant for water
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Barbie the hair is excellent to go into the water and not be knotty, but there should not be even a water toys the batteries corroded from the back that is dangerous.

customer_reviews.title: Will become your little girl’s favorite Barbie

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful doll. Tail is jointed and moves in many places. Fun!

customer_reviews.title: Be more careful when boxing it with a printer!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous waste if money!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second doll in 5 days that I’ve had to return for having the Lightup feature break within one day of play. Do not waste your time and money on this! Terribly disappointing for my 8 year old who was in love with her but seeing moldy batteries I know this simply isn’t safe. Shocked Barbie but out such a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ann Esposito

product_meta.title: Barbie Dreamtopia Sparkle Lights Mermaid Doll with Swimming Motion and Underwater Light Shows, Approx 12-Inch with Pink-Streaked Blonde Hair, Gift for 3 to 7 Year Olds​​​
product_meta.description: Sparkle Lights Barbie mermaid doll helps imaginations dive into the magical world of Barbie Dreamtopia -she features a mechanical tail that "swims" with the push of a button and light shows that can be activated when dipped into water (or out of water)! Dip Barbie doll's tail into water to automatically start one of several light shows and push the sides of her peplum for a wow moment as her tail mimics swimming -when she stops, repeat, over and over again! Kids will love helping Barbie mermaid doll swim into all kinds of stories. She's dressed for fairytale adventure in a fantasy look that features a shimmery pink bodice with blue peplum for land-locked light activation, a translucent purple tail with mechanical joints and shiny stars that showcase the light show and a holographic fin for extra shine. A blue tiara in her long, pink-streaked, blonde hair adds another fantastical touch. Play out dreams real and imagined with Barbie Sparkle Lights Mermaid doll because when you enter Dreamtopia with sisters Barbie and Chelsea, you wake up to a world where dreams become reality! Collect all the Barbie Dreamtopia dolls and toys and let your dreams set sail (each sold separately, subject to availability). Includes Barbie Dreamtopia Sparkle Lights Mermaid doll with light-up and "swimming" tail, plus tiara. Doll cannot stand or swim alone. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: ​Make a splash with Barbie Sparkle Lights Mermaid doll from Barbie Dreamtopia -- her tail features magical "swimming" motion and light-up action making her a great gift for young kids!
​Easy activation means kids can repeat the fun over and over again for storytelling surprises and magical effect!

​Simply dip Barbie mermaid doll into water to activate a rainbow light show within the translucent purple tail -- or push the sides of her peplum for a light show on land; a variety of combinations add to the surprise and delight!
​While holding her in the water -- or out -- press the sides of her peplum to start a swimming motion in the tail; it's so realistic, imaginations will dive right into storytelling!
​Barbie doll's outfit adds to the magic with a light-catching shimmery pink bodice and shiny translucent tail; accessorize with the translucent blue tiara for more fairytale fun!

​Dive into storytelling with Barbie Dreamtopia Sparkle Lights Mermaid doll -- collect all the Barbie Dreamtopia dolls and toys to recreate favorite scenes or tell your own fairytales and sail away with Chelsea and her big sister Barbie (each sold separately, subject to availability).
